name: Xtraction Point
description:
This game is made as the final project for EECS494: Introduction to Game Development course at the University of Michigan (eecs494.com). The zip file includes the build for Windows and MacOS of the final submitted version for the class. Our team is working on an update during winter to improve it. So stay tuned for updates!

To play the game, you need two controllers connected to your machine. (Xbox controllers are preferred)
